      • wrap

        public static String wrap(String text,
                          int initialLineWidth,
                          int widthIncrementPerLine,
                          String separator)
        Wraps texts so its line width grows proportionally as the number of lines increases.
        Parameters:
        text -
        initialLineWidth -
        separator -
        Returns:

      • wrap

        public static <T> List<T> wrap(List<T> elements,
                               ToIntFunction<T> elementLengthComputer,
                               int initialLineWidth,
                               int widthIncrementPerLine,
                               Supplier<T> wordSeparatorSupplier,
                               Supplier<T> lineSeparatorSupplier)
        Inserts separators into a list of elements so when these elements are rendered as text the text is wrapped in such a way that line width grows proportionally as the number of lines increases.
        Parameters:
        elements - Elements to wrap
        initialLineWidth -
        separatorSupplier - creates separators to insert into the resulting list.
        Returns:

      • createJavadocResolver

        public static Function<String,String> createJavadocResolver(Map<URL,URL> urls,
                                                            ProgressMonitor progressMonitor)
        Parameters:
        urls - Mapping of online URL's (to build links) to offline URL's (to load package lists from).
        Returns:
        Function which given a fully qualified class name returns an anchor linking to Javadoc page for the class. The argument may contain a hash symbol (fragment). Everything after the hash gets transfered to the computed URL providing ability to address fields and methods.

      • createJavadocResolver

        public static Function<String,String> createJavadocResolver(Collection<URL> urls,
                                                            ProgressMonitor progressMonitor)
        Parameters:
        urls - List of URL's.
        Returns:
        Function which given a fully qualified class name returns a URL of Javadoc page for the class.

      • createNasdanikaJavadocResolver

        public static Function<String,String> createNasdanikaJavadocResolver(File gitDir,
                                                                     ProgressMonitor progressMonitor)
                                                              throws MalformedURLException
        Creates a Javadoc resolver for Nasdanika products and their dependencies.
        Parameters:
        gitDir - Git directory with Nasdanika products locally built using Maven so they contain local API docs in their target/apidocs folders to use as offline URL's. If null of if some of apidocs directories do not exist, online URL's are used as offline URL's for those cases.
        progressMonitor -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException

      • createJavadocPropertyComputer

        public static PropertyComputer createJavadocPropertyComputer(Function<String,String> javadocResolver)
